commit.message:
This commit will make it so that true offlineMode servers will not have
their databases wiped out by the GatherResidentUUIDTask.
A sprinkle of comments & apply NPC UUIDs better.

nodes.bodyText: Super super minor thing, but I feel like this naming is weird. Maybe something else simple like markOfflineMode. Idk, the current name is accurate, but something about it just feels very too literal.
